description: Organizes information in chronological order, highlighting key events or developments over time. This decorator is ideal for historical accounts, project planning, process evolution, or any topic with a temporal dimension.

parameters.name: granularity
parameters.description: The level of time detail to include in the timeline

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The presentation format for the timeline

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: The level of detail to include for each timeline event

examples.description: Basic chronological timeline of major events
examples.usage:
+++Timeline
Describe the key developments in artificial intelligence.
examples.result: Presents a year-by-year list of important AI milestones and breakthroughs from earliest developments to present day

examples.description: Detailed narrative timeline with specific date granularity
examples.usage:
+++Timeline(granularity=month, format=narrative, details=comprehensive)
What were the major events of the Apollo 11 mission?
examples.result: Provides a flowing narrative account of the Apollo 11 mission with month/day dates and comprehensive details of each significant event
